vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.26;
son of: Joktan (H3355);
brother of: Almodad (H0486), Sheleph (H8026), Hazarmaveth (H2700), Hadoram (H1913A), Uzal (H0187), Diklah (H1853), Obal (H5745), Abimael (H0039), Sheba (H7614H), Ophir (H0211), Havilah (H2341I) and Jobab (H3103)
§ Jerah = "new moon"
a 4th son of Joktan and a progenitor of an Arabian tribe
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Joctán; descendant de Sem
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
耶拉 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "新月"
約坍的第四個兒子, 一阿拉伯部落的祖先
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
耶拉 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "新月"
约坍的第四个儿子, 一阿拉伯部落的祖先
